Plot contrastogram

Source: R/8_plot_contrastogram.R
plot_contrastogram.Rd

Plot contrastogram

plot_contrastogram(
  object,
  subgroupvar,
  colors = make_colors(slevels(object, subgroupvar), guess_sep(object)),
  curve = 0.1
)

Arguments

object

SummarizedExperiment
subgroupvar

subgroup svar
colors

named color vector (names = subgroups)
curve

arrow curvature

Value

list returned by plotmat

Examples

if (requireNamespace('diagram', quietly = TRUE)){
   file <- download_data('halama18.metabolon.xlsx')
   object <- read_metabolon(file, fit='limma', plot=FALSE)
   plot_contrastogram(object, subgroupvar = 'Group')
}
